behavioral: Tell me about a time you had to lead a difficult technical decision - I led our team's migration from monolith to microservices, which was controversial but resulted in 40% performance improvement
Describe a project where you had to learn a new technology quickly - Learned Kubernetes in 3 weeks to deploy our production system, successfully migrated all services with zero downtime
How do you handle conflicting priorities and tight deadlines? - I use agile prioritization, clear communication with stakeholders, and focus on MVP to deliver value incrementally
technical: Walk me through your approach to system design for a high-traffic application - I focus on scalability, caching strategies, database optimization, and horizontal scaling with load balancing
How would you implement a real-time notification system? - Use WebSockets or Server-Sent Events for real-time communication, Redis for pub/sub, and queue systems like RabbitMQ for reliability
Explain your experience with microservices architecture - Led migration from monolith to microservices using Docker and Kubernetes, improved deployment speed and system resilience
situational: A critical production bug is affecting customers. Walk me through your response process - Immediate triage, assemble response team, implement hotfix, communicate with stakeholders, conduct post-mortem to prevent recurrence
How would you approach mentoring a struggling team member? - One-on-one pairing sessions, clear goal setting, regular feedback, and creating safe environment for questions and learning
Describe how you would evaluate and implement a new technology in your team - Proof of concept, team training, gradual rollout, documentation, and measuring success metrics

preparation_questions: What excites you about our product? - Research company products and articulate genuine interest
Why do you want to work here? - Connect company mission to personal career goals
What questions do you have for us? - Prepare thoughtful questions about team, technology, and growth

content_chunks.title: Professional Summary
content_chunks.content: I'm a Senior Software Engineer with 5+ years of experience building scalable applications and leading technical teams. I specialize in full-stack development, cloud architecture, and AI/ML integration. My expertise includes Python, JavaScript, AWS, Docker, Kubernetes, and modern RAG systems. I'm passionate about transforming complex business challenges into elegant technical solutions.

content_chunks.title: Current Position at TechCorp
content_chunks.content: Senior Software Engineer at TechCorp Australia (Jan 2021 - Present). Led architectural redesign that reduced page load times by 40%, improved user retention by 15%, and saved $50K annually. Built CI/CD pipeline reducing deployment time from 4 hours to 15 minutes. Manage $300K infrastructure budget and mentor 3 junior developers.

content_chunks.title: Technical Expertise
content_chunks.content: Expert in Python (5 years) with Django, FastAPI, Flask. Advanced JavaScript/TypeScript (4 years) with React, Node.js, Next.js. Experienced with PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis. AWS certified with 4 years experience (EC2, RDS, S3, Lambda). Proficient in Docker, Kubernetes, and CI/CD with GitHub Actions. Current focus on RAG systems and vector databases.

content_chunks.title: Leadership and Mentoring
content_chunks.content: Led teams of 5-8 developers, mentored 3 junior developers, coordinated cross-functional teams. Certified Scrum Master with strong agile practices. Excellent at stakeholder management and technical communication. Experience managing $300K budgets and making strategic technical decisions that impact company direction.

content_chunks.title: Performance Optimization Achievement
content_chunks.content: Situation: Legacy monolith causing 3-second page load times affecting user retention. Task: Lead architectural redesign. Action: Implemented microservices architecture using Docker, Kubernetes, and Redis caching. Result: Reduced load times by 40% to 1.8s, increased user retention by 15%, saved $50K annually in server costs.

content_chunks.title: CI/CD Pipeline Achievement
content_chunks.content: Situation: Manual deployment process taking 4 hours with frequent errors. Task: Automate deployment pipeline. Action: Built CI/CD pipeline with GitHub Actions, automated testing, and deployment to AWS. Result: Reduced deployment time to 15 minutes, achieved zero-downtime deployments, 50% reduction in production bugs.

content_chunks.title: Compensation and Location Preferences
content_chunks.content: Current salary: $85,000 - $95,000 AUD. Salary expectations: $95,000 - $110,000 AUD based on role complexity. Open to Melbourne CBD, Remote, or Hybrid work. 3+ years remote experience. Willing to relocate and available for interstate travel up to 25%. Australian Citizen/Permanent Resident.

content_chunks.title: Education and Certifications
content_chunks.content: Bachelor of Computer Science from University of Melbourne (2019) with 3.7/4.0 GPA (High Distinction). Thesis on Predictive Analytics for E-commerce Recommendations. AWS Solutions Architect Associate certified (expires 2025). Certified Scrum Master (2023). Relevant coursework in Data Structures, Algorithms, Database Systems, Machine Learning.

content_chunks.title: Career Goals and Aspirations
content_chunks.content: Short-term: Lead technical architect role with AI/ML focus. Long-term: Head of Engineering at AI-first company. Currently learning advanced AI/ML systems, large-scale architecture, and team leadership. Interested in Fintech, AI/ML, Enterprise SaaS, and EdTech industries. Passionate about building and scaling technical teams.

content_chunks.title: AI and Machine Learning Experience
content_chunks.content: Built RAG systems using Upstash Vector database and Groq API. Experience with LLM integration, OpenAI API, and vector embeddings. Created AI-Powered Digital Twin Workshop Platform helping 100+ professionals. Strong understanding of semantic search, retrieval-augmented generation, and Model Context Protocol (MCP) development.

content_chunks.title: Mobile App Development Project
content_chunks.content: Situation: Client needed mobile app with tight 3-month deadline. Task: Develop cross-platform mobile application. Action: Built React Native app with backend API integration and real-time notifications. Result: Delivered 2 weeks early, app achieved 4.7-star rating with 10K+ downloads in first month.

content_chunks.title: Problem-Solving and Technical Decision Making
content_chunks.content: Approach complex problems systematically: analyze requirements, research solutions, create proof of concept, collaborate with team, implement incrementally, and measure success. Strong at balancing technical debt with feature delivery. Make data-driven decisions and document architectural choices for team alignment.
